channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- QRadar SIEM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- QRadar SIEM

item.title: CVE-2019-4210|2024-09-16T17:39:09.617Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3.2 could allow a user to bypass authentication exposing certain functionality which could lead to information disclosure or modification of application configuration. IBM X-Force ID: 158986.

item.title: CVE-2021-29750|2024-09-16T18:34:16.270Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 201778.

item.title: CVE-2020-5013|2024-09-16T20:57:20.594Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 may vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 193245.

item.title: CVE-2018-1732|2024-09-16T20:46:57.026Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar Advisor with Watson 1.14.0 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 147810.

item.title: CVE-2020-5032|2024-09-16T20:37:02.270Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 in some configurations may be vulnerable to a temporary denial of service attack when sent particular payloads. IBM X-Force ID: 194178.

item.title: CVE-2021-38874|2024-09-16T19:01:40.581Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 allows for users to access information across tenant and domain boundaries in some situations. IBM X-Force ID: 208397.

item.title: CVE-2018-1725|2024-09-16T16:33:38.595Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 n a multi tenant configuration could be vulnerable to information disclosure. IBM X-Force ID: 147440.

item.title: CVE-2019-4545|2024-09-16T17:22:49.589Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 when configured to use Active Directory Authentication may be susceptible to spoofing attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 165877.

item.title: CVE-2019-4559|2024-09-16T17:53:12.489Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3.0 through 7.3.3 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 166355.

item.title: CVE-2019-4262|2024-09-16T19:01:43.310Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 is vulnerable to Server Side Request Forgery (SSRF). This may allow an unauthenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the QRadar system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 160014.

item.title: CVE-2020-4993|2024-09-16T20:42:48.845Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 when decompressing or verifying signature of zip files processes data in a way that may be vulnerable to path traversal attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 192905.

item.title: CVE-2020-4512|2024-09-16T20:42:21.110Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 could allow a remote privileged user to execute commands.

item.title: CVE-2022-22424|2024-09-16T17:33:29.457Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information from the TLS key file due to incorrect file permissions. IBM X-Force ID: 223597.

item.title: CVE-2021-38939|2024-09-16T18:50:21.774Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be read by an user with access to creating domains. IBM X-Force ID: 211037.

item.title: CVE-2018-1733|2024-09-16T16:52:40.585Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 fails to adequately filter user-controlled input data for syntax that has control-plane implications which could allow an attacker to modify displayed content. IBM X-Force ID: 147811.

item.title: CVE-2020-4509|2024-09-16T18:44:48.589Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 182364.

item.title: CVE-2020-4510|2024-09-16T18:34:26.485Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 182365.

item.title: CVE-2019-4211|2024-09-16T16:38:47.167Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 159131.

item.title: CVE-2020-4932|2024-09-16T17:23:29.316Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 191748.

item.title: CVE-2020-4929|2024-09-16T16:23:26.840Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 191706.

item.title: CVE-2021-20393|2024-09-16T19:09:30.564Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar User Behavior Analytics 1.0.0 through 4.1.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 196001.

item.title: CVE-2018-1730|2024-09-16T18:04:10.165Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 is vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 147709.

item.title: CVE-2021-20391|2024-09-16T16:17:45.724Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar User Behavior Analytics 1.0.0 through 4.1.0 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 195999.

item.title: CVE-2023-40367|2024-09-16T19:20:54.451Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 263376.

item.title: CVE-2023-30994|2024-09-16T19:20:26.275Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 254138

item.title: CVE-2022-22345|2024-09-16T17:02:39.589Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 220041.

item.title: CVE-2018-2021|2024-09-16T16:37:53.607Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 155345.

item.title: CVE-2020-4280|2024-09-16T18:38:29.526Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by insecure deserialization of user-supplied content by the Java deserialization function. By sending a malicious serialized Java object, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 176140.

item.title: CVE-2019-4264|2024-09-16T16:42:35.877Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2.8 WinCollect could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information by spoofing a trusted entity using man in the middle techniques due to not validating or incorrectly validating a certificate. IBM X-Force ID: 160072.

item.title: CVE-2021-29776|2024-09-16T19:00:44.692Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from another user's dashboard providing the dashboard ID of that user. IBM X-Force ID: 203030.

item.title: CVE-2018-1571|2024-09-16T17:03:56.251Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar 7.2 and 7.3 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 143121.

item.title: CVE-2018-1650|2024-09-16T20:52:37.894Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 uses hard-coded credentials which could allow an attacker to bypass the authentication configured by the administrator. IBM X-Force ID: 144656.

item.title: CVE-2021-20401|2024-09-16T17:03:36.207Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 196075.

item.title: CVE-2021-38919|2024-09-16T17:33:20.924Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 in some senarios may reveal authorized service tokens to other QRadar users. IBM X-Force ID: 210021

item.title: CVE-2020-4787|2024-09-16T18:29:15.761Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.4.2 GA to 7.4.2 Patch 1, 7.4.0 to 7.4.1 Patch 1, and 7.3.0 to 7.3.3 Patch 5 is vulnerable to server side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 189224.

item.title: CVE-2021-20429|2024-09-16T18:23:33.084Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar User Behavior Analytics 1.0.0 through 4.1.0 could disclose sensitive information due an overly permissive cross-domain policy. IBM X-Force ID: 196334.

item.title: CVE-2021-38936|2024-09-16T17:54:31.227Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 could disclose highly sensitive information to a privileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 210893.

item.title: CVE-2021-39088|2024-09-16T19:30:48.153Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 is vulnerable to local privilege escalation if this could be combined with other unknown vulnerabilities then privilege escalation could be performed. IBM X-Force ID: 216111.

item.title: CVE-2020-4789|2024-09-16T18:43:31.448Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.4.2 GA to 7.4.2 Patch 1, 7.4.0 to 7.4.1 Patch 1, and 7.3.0 to 7.3.3 Patch 5 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 189302.

item.title: CVE-2023-50961|2024-08-02T22:23:44.133Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 275939.

item.title: CVE-2023-50949|2024-08-02T22:23:44.080Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized actions due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 275706.

item.title: CVE-2024-28784|2024-07-12T21:17:31.087Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 285893.

item.title: CVE-2023-50961|2024-06-04T17:17:59.051Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 275939.

item.title: CVE-2023-50949|2024-04-11T16:54:41.741Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized actions due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 275706.

item.title: CVE-2024-28784|2024-03-27T12:33:45.889Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 285893.

item.title: CVE-2024-27269|2024-06-04T17:47:00.230Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow a privileged user to configure user management that would disclose unintended sensitive information across tenants. IBM X-Force ID: 284575.

item.title: CVE-2023-50949|2024-06-26T15:37:11.292Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized actions due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 275706.

item.title: CVE-2024-27269|2024-08-02T00:27:59.955Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow a privileged user to configure user management that would disclose unintended sensitive information across tenants. IBM X-Force ID: 284575.

item.title: CVE-2024-28784|2024-08-02T00:56:58.190Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 285893.
